directions: Heat the peanut oil in a large skillet over high heat. Brown the ribs evenly in the hot oil, about 5 minutes; remove from heat.
Stir the tomato sauce, dried onion, hoisin sauce, and shiitake mushrooms together in a slow cooker. Add the ribs to the sauce mixture, turning to coat in the sauce.
Cook on Low until the ribs are falling-apart tender, 8 to 10 hours.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon dried minced onion, or more to taste
title: Hoisin (but not really) Country Ribs
